data.name: Hollow Lane
data.detailed_description: Hollow Lane follows the story of a teenager named Lucy, who must stop an impending supernatural doom from reaping the souls of the world and plunging it into eternal darkness.
data.about_the_game: Hollow Lane follows the story of a teenager named Lucy, who must stop an impending supernatural doom from reaping the souls of the world and plunging it into eternal darkness.
data.short_description: Stop an impending supernatural doom in this RPG horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is a bit demanding on the CPU. We will continue to optimize it so that this doesn't happen as much.
